title: Object.isSealed()
description: The `Object.isSealed()` static JS method determines if an object is sealed, meaning whether it’s non-extensible and its properties are non-configurable.
content: The static method that determines if an object is sealed, meaning whether it’s non-extensible and its properties are non-configurable. A sealed object cannot have new properties added to it and existing properties cannot be removed, although existing properties can still be modified.
